FAQs about hiring Luxe Venue

Is alcohol allowed?

No ‚Äì Luxe Venue operates as a non-alcoholic / dry hire space. We specialise in family-friendly and community events.

Can I book the space weekly for classes?

Yes, we welcome regular class bookings (yoga, fitness, rehearsals). Tell us your ideal days and times and we'll confirm a recurring slot if available.

What's included in the hire?

Hall space for your booked hours plus standard cleaning before and after. Extras (catering, d√©cor, photography) are booked separately.

What are your hire hours?

We accommodate flexible timings for mornings, afternoons, and evenings. Specific hours depend on availability ‚Äì enquire for your preferred slot.

How do I secure my date?

A deposit confirms your booking, with the balance due before the event. Our team will outline everything in your booking email.

Can I use it for photo/video shoots?

Absolutely! Our 8m √ó 9m space works great as a photo studio hire in Birmingham. Bring your own lighting and equipment.

Birmingham location that's easy to reach

Based in Birmingham (B12), near city centre. Easy access from Digbeth, Sparkhill, Small Heath, and across West Midlands.
